custom_buttons.name: 清除Entitlement
删除CC file
调用MTKloger
卸载MTKloger
GoldfinchTMO_OSUP
custom_buttons.script:
import subprocess
import os

# APK 路径（注意这里要用原始字符串 r"" 避免路径里的反斜杠出错）
apk_path = r"C:\Users\min.yang.na\OneDrive - TCL Technology Group Corporation\General\01 Project\T-Mobile\Goldfinch TMO_T702W\Tool\Logging APK\Android V logging tool\DebugLoggerUI.apk"

# ---------- 1️⃣ 安装 APK ----------
cmd_install = f'adb install -r -d "{apk_path}"'
print(f"正在安装 APK...\n{cmd_install}")

try:
    result = subprocess.run(cmd_install, capture_output=True, text=True, shell=True)
    out1 = (result.stdout or "").strip()
    err1 = (result.stderr or "").strip()
except Exception as e:
    print(f"❌ 执行失败: 安装命令异常: {e}")
    exit(1)
else:
    output_install = f"{out1}\n{err1}".strip()
    print(output_install)

    if "Success" in output_install:
        print("✅ APK 安装成功")
    else:
        print("❌ APK 安装失败，请检查日志或设备连接状态")
        exit(1)

# ---------- 2️⃣ 启动 Activity ----------
cmd_start = "adb shell am start -n com.debug.loggerui/.MainActivity"
print(f"\n正在启动 MTK Logger...\n{cmd_start}")

try:
    result2 = subprocess.run(cmd_start, capture_output=True, text=True, shell=True)
    out2 = (result2.stdout or "").strip()
    err2 = (result2.stderr or "").strip()
except Exception as e:
    print(f"❌ 执行失败: 启动命令异常: {e}")
    exit(1)
else:
    output_start = f"{out2}\n{err2}".strip()
    print(output_start)

    if "Starting: Intent { cmp=com.debug.loggerui/.MainActivity }" in output_start:
        print("✅ 启动成功: 已打开 MTK Logger 主界面")
    else:
        print("❌ 启动失败: 请检查是否安装正确或 Activity 名称是否匹配")

custom_buttons.name: 9008端口
删除Screenshot和Video
custom_buttons.script:
import subprocess
import sys

def confirm_delete():
    """确认是否删除（自动检测是否有PyQt环境）"""
    try:
        from PyQt5.QtWidgets import QApplication, QMessageBox
        app = QApplication.instance() or QApplication(sys.argv)
        reply = QMessageBox.question(
            None,
            "确认删除",
            "⚠️ 删除手机里面所有的截图、视频（包含Camera录制的视频），请确认是否全部删除？",
            QMessageBox.Yes | QMessageBox.No,
            QMessageBox.No
        )
        return reply == QMessageBox.Yes
    except Exception:
        # PyQt 不可用时退回命令行确认
        confirm = input(
            "⚠️ 删除手机里面所有的截图、视频（包含Camera录制的视频）。\n请确认是否全部删除？(Y/N): "
        ).strip().lower()
        return confirm == "y"

def delete_phone_media():
    adb_commands = [
        "adb shell rm /storage/emulated/0/Pictures/Screenshots/*",
        "adb shell rm /sdcard/Pictures/Screenshots/*",
        "adb shell rm /storage/emulated/0/DCIM/ViewMe/*",
        "adb shell rm /storage/emulated/0/DCIM/*",
        "adb shell rm /storage/emulated/0/DCIM/my/*",
        "adb shell rm /sdcard/DCIM/my/*",
        "adb shell rm /sdcard/DCIM/*",
        "adb shell rm /storage/DCIM/my/*",
        "adb shell rm /storage/DCIM/*",
        "adb shell rm /sdcard/DCIM/Screen\\ Recorder/*",
        "adb shell rm /storage/DCIM/Screen\\ Recorder/*",
        "adb shell rm /sdcard/DCIM/Camera/*",
        "adb shell rm /storage/DCIM/Camera/*",
        "adb shell rm /sdcard/Movies/*",
        "adb shell rm /storage/emulated/0/Screen\\ Recorder/*",
    ]

    print("\n开始执行 adb 删除命令...\n")
    for cmd in adb_commands:
        print(f"执行命令: {cmd}")
        try:
            result = subprocess.run(cmd, capture_output=True, text=True, shell=True)
            out = (result.stdout or "").strip()
            err = (result.stderr or "").strip()
            if out:
                print(f"输出:\n{out}")
            if err:
                print(f"错误:\n{err}")
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"执行异常: {e}")
        print("-" * 60)

    print("\n✅ 所有命令执行完成。")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    if confirm_delete():
        delete_phone_media()
    else:
        print("❌ 已取消删除操作。")
